**Solution**

Define 
\[
SE_{pred} = s \sqrt{\vect{x^*}^T (\mat{X}^T\mat{X})^{-1}\vect{x^*}+1},
\]
where $s$ is the residual standard error.
$SE_{pred}$ is an estimate of $Var[\vect{Y} - \vect{x^*\beta}]$.
Thus the prediction interval is
\[
\hat{y}^* \pm 1.96SE_{pred}.
\]
